title: T227 Ty Cobb Honest Long Cut SGC 30/2
author: skelly423

posts.post_title: T227 Ty Cobb Honest Long Cut SGC 30/2
posts.post_content:
Asking $5600 USD, shipping included (ships from Canada).  

Small wrinkle across top left corner.  Spot of paper loss over Cobb's left shoulder.  Solid 2.  High res scans available on request.

Card has been listed on ebay:  [url]https://www.ebay.ca/itm/164555782446[/url]

Good luck with any bids.
